attributes.action: Honour the UK's commitment to rehouse 3,000 unaccompanied Syrian child refugees
attributes.additional_details:
http://www.independent.co.uk/news/only-350-syrian-refugee-children-will-be-allowed-to-settle-in-britain-thousands-less-than-promised-a7569691.html

For more information on how you can help refugees in the UK, click here: https://www.refugees-welcome.org.uk/
attributes.background: In 2016, the UK government made a commitment to rehouse 3,000 unaccompanied Syrian child refugees. Today, Wednesday 8 February 2017, the Home Office announced that it was limiting that number to just 350. Our refusal to assist vulnerable children running from war is a moral stain on our country.

rejection.details:
This petition is similar to yours:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/183943
